long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Lets you instantly share individual tweets to Facebook.

After installing this extension, you will see `Share to Facebook` option in every tweet's option menu on Twitter.com.
Clicking on `share to Facebook` would share that tweet on your Facebook account.

This extension is opensource and is hosted on Github at https://github.com/yask123/Tweef
